text: Altererythrobacter aerius is a Gram-negative and strictly aerobic bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from air from the Xiangshan Mountain. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter aerius at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Altererythrobacter aerius
